description.narrative: The objective of the Project is to support the Recipient to perform its role as a facilitator for economic development through: (i) implementation by MDAs of a reform initiative for improved public sector management and service delivery; and (ii) strengthening of the governance and competitiveness of the financial sector

sector.narrative: Financial Sector oversight and policy/banking regulation & restructuring

condition.narrative: Bi-annual report on progress incorporating results of M&E by March 15 and September 15
Borrower's contribution to replenish the PSR and FSR Project Accounts on a quarterly basis
Maintaining a financial management system and preparing financial statements according to standards acceptable to IDA
Preparation and submission to IDA and DPs for approval Annual Work Program and Budget by October 1 each year
Prepare and submit to IDA Financial Monitoring Reports on a quarterly basis
Prompt corrective action and remedies deemed necessary after bi-annual and mid term reviews
Submit annual reports on financial status of each financial institution in Ghana regulated by BoG, NIC, SEC
Submit medium term report and carry out mid term review within one month thereafter
Submit to IDA audited report of the financial statements

title.narrative: % contribution to private pension schemes/total mandatory contributions in the pension sector

comment.narrative: Target met

title.narrative: Number of Credit Bureaus licensed and Operating

comment.narrative: Target not met. Two fully operational, with a third granted a provisional license

title.narrative: Number of equity new issues in the Ghanian market

comment.narrative: Target not met (listing identified in prior ISR were private placements). One ETF was listed in 2012.

title.narrative: % increase in private sector savings/GDP ratio

comment.narrative: Project target exceeded (Using old GDP series for consistency (pre-rebasing)

title.narrative: % of assets in the SSNIT contracted to private investment funds

baseline.value: 15% of SSNIT#s assets held in special term deposit account at banks

comment.narrative: This indicator was superseded by the 2008 pension reforms, moving Ghana to a three Tier pension scheme, with Tiers II and IIIprivately managed.

title.narrative: % increase in private sector credit (including bonds)/GDP ratio

comment.narrative: Excludes OTC not reported to GSE. Project target exceeded. Using old GDP series for consistency (pre-rebasing)

title.narrative: % of regulated institutions inspected by SEC using agreed template

comment.narrative: SEC conducts both on-site and off site inspections. On-site inspections are now risk-based.

title.narrative: Secondary market turnover as % of market capitalization (excluding Anglogold)

comment.narrative: Target not met. Note - while full year figures are not available for 2013, turnover for the first quarter alone was 1.07%.

title.narrative: % of insurance companies inspected within the year by NIC based on agreedtemplate
NIC Compliance with IAIS Core Principles as determined by WB/IMF ROSC review

comment.narrative: No new data. Target will not be met due to the move to Risk-Based Supervision

title.narrative: Number of private investment funds established and operating
BOG Compliance with relevant Basel Core Principles

comment.narrative: Target met using 1999 methodology; 65% using 2006 methodology.

title.narrative: Review time for SEC to approve Public Offers (after completion of documents)

comment.narrative: Target met. 4 week measurement assumes submissions do not need to be returned for error correction/omission

title.narrative: % of banks and NBFIs supervised based on an agreed upon template

target.value: 100% of Banks and NBFIs supervised within last 12 months

comment.narrative: Target met.

title.narrative: Long Term Savings Act is amended as needed to address the tax and regulatory issuesidentified in the PAD
% growth in number of deposit accounts at Commercial and Rural Community Banks

comment.narrative: Project target exceeded on available data. Data on commercial bank accounts not yet available for 2012 - figure above refers toincrease for RCBs only (for which data is available).

title.narrative: Dematerialized trading takes place through a demutualized exchange with automated clearing and settlement on T + 3 basis

baseline.value: No dematerialized trading through stock exchange

target.value: Dematerialized trading takes place through a demutualized exchange w/automated clearing + settlement on a T + 3 basis

actual.value: Dematerialized trading with automated clearing and setllemet on T+3 basis.

comment.narrative: Target met, though immobilization of shares is continuing (72,000 accounts by March 2013).

title.narrative: Comprehensive framework for public and private pension design and regulation is promulgated

target.value: Implementation of rules and regulations by NPRA

actual.value: Implementation of rules and regulations by NPRA.

comment.narrative: Target met.

title.narrative: Staff of at least 4 subvented agencies leave the agencies by mutual agreement

comment.narrative: Component closed.
Target met: Ghana Standards Authority; GRATIS; Trade Fair Authority; Ghana National Procurement Agency

title.narrative: Establishment of new pay range structure to guide pay awards

comment.narrative: Pay scaled has been established.

title.narrative: Civil service law reviewed and presented to Parliament

comment.narrative: Component closed
Target met.

title.narrative: % of customers who are satisfied with services provided by CSU (80% by 2011)

comment.narrative: Achieved - verification in consultants report

title.narrative: 35% reduction in government subvention for selected agencies (by June 2011)

comment.narrative: Not achieved (data not available)

title.narrative: % of outputs in their MoUs completed by CMAs under reform (PSC, OHCS, SEC CAGD, MOFEP) (90% by 2011)

comment.narrative: Project target met. Fair Wages & Salaries 100%; MoFEP 100%; PSC 100%; OHCS 100%; CAGD 70%; SEC 60%

title.narrative: Enhanced Structure, strategy and responsibility within Government for public sector reform by end 2006

comment.narrative: Project target met. Ministry of Public Sector Reform established, and transformed into PSR Secretariat in 2009. PSR Strategydocument completed 2006

title.narrative: # of MDAs publishing service standrads (45 by 2011)

comment.narrative: Project target met. Published in national media.

title.narrative: % of complaints registered at CSU resolved in less than 1 month (80% by 2011)

comment.narrative: Project target met. Verification in consultant's report

title.narrative: A limited subvented agencies reform program is completed

comment.narrative: Project target met.

title.narrative: Fair Wages & Salaries Commission is strengthened and resourced to implement the new pay policy (by end 2012)

comment.narrative: Project target met.

title.narrative: # of agencies publishing data on progress on achieving service standards (25 by 2011)

comment.narrative: Project target not achieved - no data.

title.narrative: Proportion of civil service recruitment and promotion based on new merit based recruitment and promotion system reaches 60% (by June 2011)

comment.narrative: Project target not met. Document developed and not fully implemented' competency framework not established. Performance appraisalpiloted in 2011.

title.narrative: % of public servant HR data available through secure HR website (40% by 2011)

comment.narrative: Project target not met. Now being implemented under GIFMIS Project.

title.narrative: Institutional and staff census by Ghana Education Service to identify ghost workers and delete them from payroll completed (by 2009)

comment.narrative: Target achieved. Verification by report.

title.narrative: % of positions for which satisfactory job descriptions exist (60% by 2011)

comment.narrative: Target met (verification required). Improved performance management system developed by PSC and piloted in 2011 OHCS, trainingconducted

title.narrative: Initiation of a substantive reform program at a MDA (by 2006)

comment.narrative: Target met. Reform program started.

title.narrative: # of civil servants receiving satisfactory evaluations on training 3 months after completion (420 by 2011)

comment.narrative: Target met. Verification in consultant's report.

title.narrative: 70% of public servants remunerated on the basis of a unified national pay spine

comment.narrative: Target met.

title.narrative: MoU on the pooled account for PSR signed among DPs and GoG is complied with (by 2008)

comment.narrative: Target not achieved. no DPs came in so not applicable.
